completed_features: Create the module directory structure `app/code/Vendor/AutoCacheFlush/`, the `registration.php` file to register the component, and the `etc/module.xml` file to declare the module name and version.
Create the `app/code/Vendor/AutoCacheFlush/etc/crontab.xml` file to define the cron job schedule (every 2 hours) and configure it to call the `Vendor\AutoCacheFlush\Cron\FlushCache::execute` method.
last_commit: feat(cron): add crontab.xml configuration for auto cache flush every 2 hours
